description: Treillis triangle: a triangle read by rows showing the coefficients of sum formulas of Treillis numbers (A115298). The k-th row (k>=1) contains a(n,k) for n=1 to (k+1)/2 (odd rows) and for n=1 to k/2 (even rows), where a(n,k) satisfies Sum_{n=1..[(k+1)/2_odd, k/2_even]} a(n,k). The last term of each row (and its only odd number) equals Prime(k+1)-2.
